title: How to Remove Odors from Cutting Boards
summary: Using lemon and salt to remove odors from cutting boards.
content: To remove odors from cutting boards using lemon and salt, sprinkle a generous amount of salt over the cutting board. Cut a lemon in half and rub the cut side over the salted surface. Squeeze the lemon juice onto the board and let it sit for at least 10 minutes. Afterward, rinse the cutting board with warm water and dry it thoroughly. The lemon and salt will help to neutralize odors and disinfect the cutting board.
